contextId.information: The words "wrath" and "fierce anger" mean basically the same thing and emphasize God's anger. AT: "God will show his terrible anger" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
contextId.quote: wrath and fierce anger will come

contextId.information: The words "tribulation" and "distress" mean basically the same thing here and emphasize how bad God's punishment will be. AT: "awful punishments will happen to" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
These words both mean the same thing. (See [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
These two expressions mean basically the same thing. Paul uses them to emphasize that he is telling the truth. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
contextId.quote: I tell the truth in Christ. I do not lie

contextId.information: Both of these phrases mean basically the same thing. If you need to, you can combine them in your translation. AT: "when the Jews failed spiritually, the result was that God abundantly blessed the non-Jews" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
contextId.quote: if their failure is the riches of the world, and if their loss is the riches of the Gentiles

contextId.information: Here "wisdom" and "knowledge" mean basically the same thing. AT: "How amazing are the many benefits of both God's wisdom and knowledge!" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
contextId.quote: Oh, the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and the knowledge of God!

contextId.information: Here "stumbling block" and "snare" mean basically the same thing. AT: "but instead make it your goal not to do or say anything that might cause a fellow believer to sin" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
contextId.quote: but instead decide this, that no one will place a stumbling block or a snare for his brother

contextId.information: Here the words "know" and "am persuaded" mean basically the same thing; Paul uses them to emphasize his certainty. AT: "I am certain because of my relationship with the Lord Jesus" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
contextId.quote: I know and am persuaded in the Lord Jesus
